beer.beer_description:
We’ve teamed up with Protect Our Winters Australia to bring you our second collab beer for season 2024 – the POW Whiteout White IPA. This Belgian-inspired White IPA combines the best of both worlds: a hazy, hop-forward IPA with the refreshing character of a wheat beer. 

Brewer’s Notes: “A Belgian-inspired White IPA, this hazy brew is hop-driven with a generous addition of wheat. The yeast imparts delightful notes of clove, spice, and banana, while the hops burst through with vibrant tropical and citrus flavours. Perfectly refreshing after those pow-chasing adventures!” 

Malts: Pale, Wheat Malt, Malted Oats 

Hops: Cryo Amarillo, Cryo Azacca, Amarillo, Azacca, Citra 
Yeast: SafAle BW20 
Colour: Hazy Pale Yellow

items.checkin_comment: Bright, wheaty, Belgiany with tropical, orange & spice notes. Decidedly citrus & tropical finish. Awesome and fresh, lightly malted (but balanced) west coast ipa.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 205 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 42! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 125 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 26! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 200 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 41!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 145 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 30! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 135 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 28.

items.checkin_comment: Picked this up at Bright brewery while there during Easter on 19/4/25. Pretty basic IPA. Hoppy and sharp in flavour

user.bio:
Beer & Travel Lover & Barman
Like to enjoy everyday as it's last and to have fun.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 140 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 29!

items.badge_description: The community has spoken and the 2025 Brewery Madness Champion is none other than the legends at Tree House Brewing Company! When it comes to making beloved beers, nobody does it quite like Tree House and this makes them back-to-back champs of our annual Brewery Madness tournament. This badge celebrates their 2025 Brewery Madness victory!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 5 distinct venues!

user.bio: First time caller, long time listener

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 160 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 33!
